page.title: 09Military College Shrivenham
page.content: nations from the free world mainly Australians.Most of the nationalities take Army degree courses.There are three types divided into thirds one third are degree courses in engineering and such things.Another third is Army staff courses each of these are about 12 months long but in the final third they are only 1-6 weeks long specialist courses.The Commandant in residence at the moment has had something to do with the army since 1955 but has only been Commandant since 1983.There have been 14 other Commandants since 1946. The normal age of someone joining the forces is 18,but this is not strictly true for when you reach the age of 17 and a half you are paid the wages of a man and can be sent to war,but you may actually join when you are 15.5 years old.
